title: Smart Data Models - Smart Data Models - Smart Data Models - Health - Medical Checks / MedicalCheck

date.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. Date when the medical check takes place.  Model: 'https://schema.org/Date'

patient.description: Relationship. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. Id of the patient

checkType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Type of the visit

drug.description: Relationship. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. List of drugs which are taken by the patient. Model: 'https://schema.org/drug'

healthCondition.description: Relationship. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. Specifying the health condition(s) of a patient, medical study, or other target audience. Model: 'https://schema.org/MedicalCondition' based on ICT10
